Lucas in demand

The imperial cycle of Real Madrid in the Champions League has consequences, one of which is that Lucas Vazquez is in high demand from some of Europe's biggest clubs.

Liverpool have shown an interest in Marco Asensio, but they're also in the hunt for his teammate.

Aside from the Reds, Arsenal are keen.

From Italy, Milan have been in contact, but the one year ban from playing in Europe effectively rules the Rossoneri out of the equation.

Thibaut Courtois has always been among the favourites to replace Keylor Navas as Real Madrid goalkeeper and he continues to have plenty of backing among the club's hierarchy now.
